sentences.sentence: The book is an excellent vignette of some of the major debates in science.
sentences.translation: 这本书非常清晰且扼要地介绍了科学界的一些主要争议。

sentences.sentence: Vignette: Rejuvenating Their Enterprise CMS Brand
sentences.translation: Vignette：重塑企业内容管理品牌

sentences.sentence: If so, maybe you bought stock in Vignette when they did their IPO in February 1999.
sentences.translation: 如果你记得，可能你还在1999年Vignette公司首次公开上市的时候买过他们的股票。
